name: Speed Ball - Shot Evolution
description:
Speed Ball is a fun arcade game! You have to guide the ball through all kinds of obstacles to advance to the next level. Get as many points as you can. Acquire and earn shields, level skips, and use the in game guided laser to help you through.

Features:

• Simple but fun and addicting gameplay.
• Multiple levels to keep you challenged.
• Awesome graphics, cool music, and sounds!
• Share option to show your friends and family how good you really are.

Share with your friends and see how accurate you truly are.
